alert.note: Alert for Harrison; Mercer (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 17 at 6:26PM CDT until June 17 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MERCER AND EASTERN HARRISON COUNTIES... At 625 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bethany, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bethany, Ridgeway, Eagleville, Cainsville, Blythedale and Mount Moriah. This includes Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 88 and 97, and between mile markers 99 and 113. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
